title: Italian motorcycle sticker typeface
content:
Hey all,

this sticker came off an Italian (awesome) motorbike, DB7.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/millen-example_5574.jpg)

Any idea on typeface?

text “MILLENOVANTOTTO”

Cheerz  
Rod
author: rmunoz

comments.content:
I think [Serpentine Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105549/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/) will get you there if you widen it.

- Mike Yanega

yeah !!!, nice...

thanks Mike.

I just laid white rectangles over the curly bits and squashed it.. fantastic

thanks again  
Rod
